Name: Landmarks, Beverley Square West Historic District, DL 547/LP 2692, Brooklyn (N 260209 HKK).
Title: Application No. N 260209 HKK (DL 547, LP 2692) (Beverley Square West Historic District) submitted by the Landmarks Preservation Commission, pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter, for the historic district designation of the Beverley Square West Historic District, consisting of properties generally bounded by Westminster Road to the west, Beverley Road to the north, East 16 Street to the east, and Cortelyou Road to the south, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 14, Council District 40.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings, Resiliency and Dispositions
